snippet: Indiana, the nation’s highest-scoring team, produced only 7 points in the final four and a half minutes, but that was enough to hold off No. 8 Minnesota for an 88-81 home victory.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Indiana beats Minnesota, 88-81; other men's amd women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Indiana, the nation’s highest-scoring team, produced only 7 points in the final four and a half minutes, but that was enough to hold off No. 8 Minnesota for an 88-81 home victory.

headline.main: Indiana’s First Half Compensates for Lackluster Second, but Barely
headline.print_headline: Indiana’s First Half Compensates for Lackluster Second, but Barely
